CaseTeamTemplateMember.name: CaseTeamTemplateMember
CaseTeamTemplateMember.description: Represents a member on a predefined case team, which is a group of users that helps resolve cases.

MemberId.description: The ID of the user or contact who is a team member on a predefined case team.

TeamRoleId.description: The ID of the predefined case team member's case team role.

TeamTemplateId.description: The ID of the predefined case team's template.
